task.title: Touching grass
task.shortdesc: Here, you will learn how to touch grass.

context.p: Touching grass is the most important way to tell if your lawn is full of healthy grass. It's also a great way to get some fresh air.

step.cmd: Plant your hands firmly down onto the grass.
Feel for any abnoralities with the grass. Is it hot? Cold? Wet? Dry?
Stand back up. You have now just touched grass!

p.note: If you want to tell someone online that they should go outside in a mean way, tell them to touch grass. Don't tell friends and family to do this.
